@notice Returns the error message for a passed failed check reason
   * @param  _reason The reason code: 0 means success.  Non-zero values are left to the implementation
                to assign meaning.
   * @return The human-readable mesage string

@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.

nodes.documentation:
@title Standard ERC20 token
 * @dev Implementation of the basic standard token.
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
Based on code by FirstBlood: https://github.com/Firstbloodio/token/blob/master/smart_contract/FirstBloodToken.sol
nodes.name: StandardToken
transferFrom
approve
allowance
increaseApproval
decreaseApproval
MintableToken
mint

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to stop minting new tokens.
@return True if the operation was successful.
nodes.name: finishMinting

nodes.documentation: @notice An ERC-20 token that has the ability to check for trade validity
nodes.name: RegulatedToken

nodes.documentation: @notice Triggered when regulator checks pass or fail
nodes.name: CheckStatus
transfer
transferFrom
_check

nodes.documentation:
@notice Retreives the address of the `RegulatorService` that manages this token.
   * @dev This function *MUST NOT* memoize the `RegulatorService` address.  This would
     break the ability to upgrade the `RegulatorService`.
   * @return The `RegulatorService` that manages this token.
nodes.name: _service
detectTransferRestriction

nodes.documentation:
@notice Implementing messageForTransferRestriction makes this token ERC-1404 compatible
    * @dev The RegulatorService contract must implement the function messageforReason in this implementation

    * @param reason The restrictionCode returned from the service check
    * @return The human-readable mesage string
nodes.name: messageForTransferRestriction
